sentences.english: A batch of excellent germplasm resources were obtained by selection, which can be applied to quality breeding in adzuki bean.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出一批優異種質資源可應用於小豆品質育種。

sentences.english: Hebei Red Bean has a higher nutritional value.
sentences.chinese: 河北紅小豆具有較高的營養價值。

sentences.english: There were mud marks on Roo's shirt.
sentences.chinese: 小豆的衣服上有些泥巴的污點。

sentences.english: I think that this is a painful moment in the small Dou.
sentences.chinese: 我想，那一刻的小豆豆該是多痛苦。

sentences.english: They can also make cool and refreshing ice cream, popsicles and red bean soup.
sentences.chinese: 每逢盛夏，可用紅小豆製成雪糕，冰棒，冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Chixiaodou is a high protein, low fat food.
sentences.chinese: 赤小豆是一種高蛋白，低脂肪的食物。

sentences.english: One of the main stored grain insects of adzuki bean is Callosobruchus chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 綠豆象是小豆的主要倉貯害蟲。

sentences.english: Chapter One analyzes the motivations of the creation of XiaoDouPeng.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分探討《小豆棚》的創作動機。

sentences.english: V. hulls can be utilized as a new type of anthocyanins resource.
sentences.chinese: 黑小豆種皮可作爲一種新型花色苷資源加以利用。

sentences.english: Tianjin Small Red Beans have a long export history. They are our traditional export product.
sentences.chinese: 天津紅小豆出口歷史悠久，是天津傳統出口商品。

sentences.english: Add fish together with milky liquid to the red beans soup, boil 1 hr. on medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 鯪魚連湯同加入赤小豆湯同煲，以中火煲1小時。

sentences.english: Adzuki bean is one of traditional grain legumes in China.
sentences.chinese: 紅小豆是我國傳統的栽培豆類之一。

sentences.english: Just then Kanga and Roo came along.
sentences.chinese: 正在那個時候袋鼠媽媽和小豆走了過來。

definition: an undergarment covering chest and abdomen
